text: Paris Smith (born February 1, 2000) is an American singer and actress. She is best known for her role in the Nickelodeon show Every Witch Way as Maddie Van Pelt. In 2013, she won a Young Artist Award in the category Young Actress 11 and 12 in a Short Film for her performance in Scouted. == Filmography == Year Title Role 2010 The Presentation Rachel 2011 Puncture Kia (12 years old) 2012 I am Not a Hipster Joy (young) 2012 Scouted Molly 2012 MyMusic Girl #3 2013 Modern Family Becca 2013 The Bedtime Story Jamie 2013 Totally Crystal 2014 R.A.D.I.C.A.L.S Ryan 2014-2015 Every Witch Way Maddie Van Pelt == Discography == Title Year Certifications Album Crush on Hollywood 2011 Non-album Game Over 2011 Non-album He Says 2011 Non-album == Awards and nominations == Year Award Category Work Result 2013 Young Artist Award Best Performance in a Short Film Scouted 2014 Young Artist Award Best Performance in a TV Series Modern Family == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Texas Category:American child actors Category:American child singers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Paris Smith
